mcq.statement: In a photoelectric effect experiment at a frequency above cut off, the stopping potential is proportional to?

options.a: the energy of the least energetic electron before it is ejected
options.b: the energy of the least energetic electron after it is ejected
options.c: the energy of the most energetic electron before it is ejected
options.d: the energy of the most energetic electron after it is ejected
